message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you $400,000. You can do better or worse in the next round!
You gave me a good starting point, now it's my turn to make a stronger move!
You tried to strong-arm me, now it's my turn to make a counteroffer. Take $450,000 or walk away!
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'll squeeze back! Take it or leave it!
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'll squeeze back! I'll give you $510,000, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're getting desperate, I can see it. This is my best offer, take it or walk away!
You think you're getting the upper hand, but I'm not done yet! Take $520,000, or we'll both lose out!
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or regret it!
You're trying to take advantage of my desperation, but I'll still try to get a fair deal. Take $550,000, or we'll both lose out!
You're getting close to the edge, Alice. This is my last chance to make a deal. Take it or lose everything!
You're trying to take advantage of my desperation, but I'll still try to get a decent deal. Take $580,000, or we'll both lose out!
This is my final offer. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing. I'm willing to take a risk to get the better deal.
